com.turnout.ws.controller

Class BeaconMasterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.BeaconMasterController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class BeaconMasterController
extends java.lang.Object
    BeaconMasterController class is front face for accessing and manipulating beacon related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeaconMasterController(BeaconMasterService beaconMasterService)
      An injectable constructor with a dependency of beaconMasterService as argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONArray beaconsList(java.lang.String search)
      This method used to get all the beacons from database and helps to search the beacons based on given string.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getBeaconDetails(java.lang.String bconId, int stdId)
      This method will get beacon details from database based on studio id and beacon id.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject saveBeacon(org.json.simple.JSONObject beacon)
      This method used to save a beacon details into database.It will return a beacon id (primary key) of just inserted or updated beacon.

    • Method Detail

      • beaconsList

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/beacons/search/{search}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray beaconsList(@PathParam(value="search")
                                                                   java.lang.String search)
        This method used to get all the beacons from database and helps to search the beacons based on given string. The string may have the value of beacon id or studio name.
        Parameters:
        search - A string holds a text that has to be searched.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.

      • getBeaconDetails

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/beaconDetail/bconid/{bconId}/stdid/{stdId}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getBeaconDetails(@PathParam(value="bconId")
                                                                         java.lang.String bconId,
                                                                         @PathParam(value="stdId")
                                                                         int stdId)
        This method will get beacon details from database based on studio id and beacon id.
        Parameters:
        bconId - A unique id of beacon.
        stdId - A unique id of studio.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of beacon element.

      • saveBeacon

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@POST
@Path(value="/saveBeacon")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveBeacon(org.json.simple.JSONObject beacon)
        This method used to save a beacon details into database.It will return a beacon id (primary key) of just inserted or updated beacon.
        Parameters:
        beacon - A JSONObject contains whole information of beacon.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of inserted beacon's id.
